name: Supreme Tic-Tac-Toe (traceyb)
description:
You, a mere mortal meatbag, face off against the perfect immortal machine known as "Supreme" in an epic battle of X's and O's. It will require all or your human cunning to find and exploit bugs to defeat Supreme at it's own game.

Highlights

  • 8 unique paths to victory.
  • Over 200 ego shattering quips and insults. 
  • Disappointing 8 bit graphics.
  • Open-Source ( lua, love2d )

Developer Notes

Supreme TicTacToe was created when I was playing around with implementing miniMax alpha beta pruning in Lua for Love2d. I got tired of playing against myself and so added a little frenemy to play against. From there things got out of hand and it turned into an attempt to wring something fun and creative out of what some might call the "Hello World" of game development Tic-Tac-Toe.

Source Code 

https://github.com/tboydston/supremetictactoe

Credits

QA Manager: Grant Brown
Additional Testing: Riley Boydston, Stuart Grinnel
